CardHand - Class in aguiaj.cards.util
Represents card hands, composed of zero or more ordered cards.

Constructs an empty card hand.

Constructs a card hand using the cards contained in the array cards.

CardStack - Class in aguiaj.cards.util
Represents card stacks, which can be displayed according to different modes: all cards hidden, only the top card visible, all cards shown.

Constructs an empty card stack.
